documents.document:
Considering Courses for Logistics?

If you are looking for courses for logistics, then you do not have to look any further than a company called ABTS Training Services. This is a well established and experienced training company that is located in central London. They have a great training facility where they hold one day courses as well as a five week intensive course for beginners. They focus on all aspects of logistics including importation, exportation, letters of credit, and more.

Classes Offered at ABTS

They offer five one day courses that can help you and your employees prepare, and they also serve as good refresher courses for companies that are “re-entering” the world of international trade. One example of these one day courses includes the course titled a Practical Guide to Export Documentation and Procedure. This course covers a variety of topics including buyer and seller responsibilities, controlling your freight costs, preferential trading, institute clauses A, B, and C, and much more.

Another example of one of the one day courses for logistics that is offered by ABTS Training Services includes the course titled a Practical Guide to Documentary Letters of Credit. The topics covered in this class include the different types of letters of credit, the supporting documents that you might need, how to be proactive not reactive, and much more. They also have a one day course on international purchasing, and one on importation. They even have an Incoterms 2010 course that helps explain the newest incoterms.

The Intensive Course for Beginners

The Intensive Course for Beginners is a good option if you are looking for courses for logistics. This course covers all aspects of logistics over a five week period in which classes meet every Saturday. This is a great option for local businesses because employees can attend the course on Saturdays, and they do not have to miss any work. This course is also a great option for individuals who would like to learn more about international trade and logistics.

ABTS Training Services is also currently working on creating an online course. As of yet, the entire course has not been completed. However, they do have a preview option where you can log in and preview the course on their website.

Other Training Options from ABTS

While the previously mentioned courses might work for some businesses, they are more geared toward small groups and individuals. If you have a larger company or if you are not located in the UK, ABTS still has options for you. They can send an instructor to your business no matter where you are located. This instructor will provide onsite courses for logistics, and you can have as many employees trained as you need. This is a great option for many businesses especially if the business would need to pay for transportation, visas, etc in order to send employees to ABTS’s training centre in London.

If you want to learn more about the courses for logistics that ABTS Training Services provides for businesses and individuals, you should contact them today.

This is a great option for local businesses because employees can attend the course on Saturdays, and they do not have to miss any work.
